title_en: When's it due ?
title_zh: 什么时候截止？

title_en: Tell me a bit abort yourself.
title_zh: 介绍下你自己。

title_en: When's this rain gonna let up?
title_zh: 雨什么时候才停？

title_en: You're a real pain in the neck ,you know ?
title_zh: 你真让人头大。

title_en: It's such a waste of time .
title_zh: 简直就是浪费时间。

title_en: Wow. What a big boy !
title_zh: 简直像个大人儿！。

title_en: You sound horrible !
title_zh: 听起来你病得挺重的。

title_en: Come on, spit it out.
title_zh: 快点，有话直说。

title_en: How did you enjoy your stay ,Robinson?
title_zh: Robinson 先生，您在这里住的怎么样?

title_en: You made these from scrach?
title_zh: 你自己从头做的？

title_en: You know, I'd love to, but I can't.
title_zh: 我很想去，但实在没办法。

title_en: I highly recommemd it.
title_zh: 我极力推荐。

title_en: Go right ahead .
title_zh: 请便。

title_en: No way! Get out of here!
title_zh: 不可能！别扯淡了！

title_en: It's kind of hit-or-miss.
title_zh: 它时好时坏。

title_en: I have bags under my eyes, don't I ?
title_zh: 我有眼袋是吗？

title_en: Nah, she's way out of my league.
title_zh: 得了吧，我哪配得上人家呀。

title_en: He just blew me off.
title_zh: 他就这么把我给打发了。

title_en: I'd like to cancel my membership.
title_zh: 我要取消健身房会员。

title_en: OK, well, I'll let you go.
title_zh: 好的，那就先聊到这儿。

title_en: The pace here is a lot slower.
title_zh: 这里的生活节奏可真是慢多了。

title_en: I've got goose bumps.
title_zh: 我起鸡皮疙瘩了。

title_en: You have my word.
title_zh: 我向你保证。

title_en: It happens. Don't worry about it.
title_zh: （出错）是常有的事，别担心。

title_en: You're soaking wet!
title_zh: 你都湿透了。

title_en: Sorry to keep you waiting.
title_zh: 抱歉久等了。

title_en: I was pleasantly surprised.
title_zh: 太让我惊喜了。

title_en: I can definitely relate to that.
title_zh: 我感同身受，我深有体会。

title_en: I hope you can join us for dinner.
title_zh: 我希望你能和我们一起吃晚饭。

title_en: He always talks big.
title_zh: 他总是吹牛。

title_en: Time to call it a night for me.
title_zh: 今晚我就到此为为止了。

title_en: You're headed for trouble.
title_zh: 你会惹上麻烦的。

title_en: Don't you dear!
title_zh: 你敢！

title_en: Who do you think you're talking to?
title_zh: 你以为你在跟谁说话？

title_en: Dude,it's so dope!
title_zh: 哥们儿，简直帅爆了！

title_en: Try to get in around nine.
title_zh: 尽量 9 点左右到。

title_en: Guys, help me straighten up a little please.
title_zh: 各位，来帮我打扫下房间。

title_en: He's a guy from my apartment complex.
title_zh: 他是我公寓大楼的一个人。

title_en: So Claire, what do you do ?
title_zh: Claire, 你是做什么的？

title_en: Actually, I'm looking to switch careers.
title_zh: 实际上，我在考虑转行。

title_en: Let's drop the subject.
title_zh: 我们换个话题吧。

title_en: Easy,man. You will pass.
title_zh: 放轻松，兄弟，你会过的。

title_en: I totally slipped my mind.
title_zh: 我完全忘了这码事了。

title_en: Get off my case.
title_zh: 别管我。

title_en: It's pretty catchy.
title_zh: 这首歌很上口呢。

title_en: I'd better lock it up.
title_zh: 我最好还是锁起来。

title_en: Give me a second, I've got something to say.
title_zh: 等等，我有话要说。

title_en: By the way,you look really young.
title_zh: 顺便一提，你看起来真年轻啊。

title_en: Don't judge a person by their apperance.
title_zh: 不要以貌取人。

title_en: Can you refresh my memory?
title_zh: 你能帮我回忆一下吗？

title_en: How'd you manage to pull that off ?
title_zh: 你怎么弄到（这么难弄）的？

title_en: There's some kind of funky odor in here.
title_zh: 这儿有股臭味。

title_en: There's nothing good on right now.
title_zh: 现在没有什么好看的电视。

title_en: Make sure they've got everythiong.
title_zh: 确保一定要里外全熟。

title_en: This place is a complete rip-off.
title_zh: 这家餐厅是骗人的。

title_en: My allergies are killing me!
title_zh: 我的过敏症要把我折磨死了！

title_en: I'm having chest pains.
title_zh: 我胸口疼。

title_en: It took forever to go through customs.
title_zh: 过海关花了好长时间。

title_en: I ususlly ware it parted on the side.
title_zh: 我通常喜欢偏分。

title_en: There you go, you're all buckled in!
title_zh: 好了，安全带都系好啦！

title_en: I got this on sale for only four bucks.
title_zh: 我买了这个只花了四块钱。

title_en: I got in an accident and messed up your car.
title_zh: 我碰上事故了，把你的车撞坏了。

title_en: I'm still on the fence.
title_zh: 我还在犹豫中。

title_en: Are you planning on asking her out?
title_zh: 你打算约她出去吗？

title_en: There's a bug buzzing around my head!
title_zh: 有一只虫子一直在我耳边嗡嗡叫！

title_en: No, I couldn't possibly. I'm so stuffed.
title_zh: 我吃不下了，我很撑了。

title_en: Can you fit me in this afternoon?
title_zh: 能给我安排在下午么？

title_en: Think of this as an opportunity.
title_zh: 你可以把这当做一个机会。

title_en: My old one's kind of worn-out-looking.
title_zh: 我的旧手机太破了。

title_en: Do you have any formal training?
title_zh: 你受过专业培训吗？

title_en: Your nose is runny. Come here and let me wipe it.
title_zh: 你流鼻涕了。过来，我给你擦擦。

title_en: What's wrong? Does your tummy hurt?
title_zh: 哪里不舒服？是不是肚子疼？

title_en: This is like a dream come true for me.
title_zh: 简直就是美梦成真啊！

title_en: Ah,I pulled my hamstring.
title_zh: 啊，我的腿拉伤了。

title_en: It must be clogged.
title_zh: 估计是（管道）堵了。

title_en: Have these been run?
title_zh: 这些（盘子）都洗过了吗？

title_en: This was literally the best meal I've ever had.
title_zh: 这真是我吃过最好吃的。

title_en: We've actually had to turn away business.
title_zh: 我们（太忙了）得推掉一些生意。

title_en: It's never a dull moment.
title_zh: 一刻也没有消停过。

title_en: Our subscription to The Times is coming up for renewal.
title_zh: 我们要续订时报了。

title_en: Yeah, but then it'll be blocking one of the outlets.
title_zh: 是嘛，但是这样会挡住一个插座啊。

title_en: This place is dead.
title_zh: 这地方死气沉沉的。

title_en: I need to get my prescription filled, so I'll be back in a while.
title_zh: 我要去拿药了，很快就回来。

title_en: Do you want the aisle seat?
title_zh: 你要靠过道的座位吗？

title_en: I guess it requires some assembly.
title_zh: 看来这需要组装。

title_en: I was wondering if I could exchange them for another pair.
title_zh: 请问我可以换双手套吗？

title_en: Can you please swipe your card and enter your PIN number?
title_zh: 请您刷一下银行卡，然后输入密码。

title_en: Is there anything in particular you're in the mood for?
title_zh: 你有什么特别想吃的吗？

title_en: They're down to four teams now.
title_zh: 现在只剩下四支球队了。

title_en: Do you have any recommendations for a nice, balanced red?
title_zh: 你能给我推荐一款口感均衡的红酒吗？

title_en: Watch out! Your fingers are going to get caught in the door.
title_zh: 小心！你的手指要被门夹住了。

title_en: You can hear the gas coming out when you turn the knob, but it dose't ignite.
title_zh: 当你旋转旋钮时能听见煤气出来的声音，但是没有点着火。

title_en: Only 2 left in stock - order soon !
title_zh: 库存仅 2 件，尽快下单！

title_en: Can you hold it steady for me?
title_zh: 能帮我扶稳吗？

title_en: Pay close attention to the bottom right corner.
title_zh: 仔细看右下角。

title_en: I'll have a chef's salad, dressing on the side please.
title_zh: 我要一份主厨沙拉，酱料分开放。

title_en: Can you hold it in for a few more minutes ?
title_zh: 你能再忍几分钟吗？

title_en: You need to take the express train.
title_zh: 你需要坐快车。

title_en: After that, you just have to simmer it for an hour or so.
title_zh: 之后，你只要大约再炖一个小时。

title_en: Transfer to the 'R' at 42nd Street.
title_zh: 在 42 大街站换成地铁 R 线。

title_en: You seem to be grinding your teeth at night.
title_zh: 看起来你晚上磨牙。

title_en: The moment I saw her,it was love at first sight.
title_zh: 第一眼看到就决定是她了。

title_en: You're supposed to reapply it every couple of hours.
title_zh: 你应该每隔几小时再涂一次。

title_en: The forecast calls for rain.
title_zh: 天气预报说有雨。

title_en: All baggage must be stowed in the overhead container.
title_zh: 所有的行李i需放在头部的行李舱内。

title_en: Did I leave my camera at your place, by any change?
title_zh: 我是不是把相机落在你那了？

title_en: Yes, I'd like to place an order for delivery?
title_zh: 您好，我想点一份外卖。

title_en: I forgot to charge it. It's running out off juice.
title_zh: 我忘记充电了，快没电了。

title_en: We're abort to take off. I'll call you when I lend.
title_zh: 我们要起飞了，等我到了之后再给你打电话。

title_en: We're meeting up to sign the lease later this afternoon.
title_zh: 我们下午晚些时候就碰面，把租房合同签了。

title_en: It says not to take it on an empty stomach.
title_zh: 上面说不能空腹吃。

title_en: I'd like to send this via registered mail.
title_zh: 我想寄feng挂号信。

title_en: Can you at least give me a ballpack?
title_zh: 你能至少估算个大概吗？

title_en: The fenfer is a little dented. Otherwise, it's as good as new.
title_zh: 挡泥板被幢撞凹了。除此之外，它完好如新。

title_en: Please do not leave your valuables unattended
title_zh: 请保管好您的贵重物品。

title_en: I'm headed out of grab some lunch. You want me to pick you up something?
title_zh: 我要出门买午饭。你想要我帮你带点什么吗？

title_en: She can come across as stuck-up aas first.
title_zh: 开始她看上去似乎挺拽的。

title_en: this one's quite a bit cheaper...but it has a six hour layover in Lindon.
title_zh: 这趟航班便宜不上...但中途得在伦敦停留 6 个小时。

title_en: I could really use a cup of coffe.
title_zh: 我真的很想来一杯咖啡。

title_en: It depends. What are you making?
title_zh: 看情况吧，你要做什么？

title_en: He thought he'd just sprained,but it turned out it was fractured.
title_zh: 他原以为自己只是扭伤了，结果却是骨折了。

title_en: The video's pretty choppy on my end.
title_zh: 我这边很卡。

title_en: I tend to dress a little more conservatively at the office.
title_zh: 上班时我往往穿的更保守一点。

title_en: Just keep track of how much you're spending and i'll pay you back.
title_zh: 先记下来你花了多少钱，我之后给你。

title_en: It's your turn to take the trash out.
title_zh: 轮到你去倒垃圾了。

title_en: Personally, I try to adhere to local customs whenever possible.
title_zh: 就我个人而言，我会尽可能入乡随俗。

title_en: They're a little bland, don't you think?
title_zh: 你不觉得它有点淡吗？

title_en: Let's just not bother cooking tonight.
title_zh: 我们今晚就没必要做饭了。

title_en: I was on the verge of going to sleep at one point.
title_zh: 我曾一度昏昏欲睡。

title_en: We need to get this resolved as soon as possible.
title_zh: 我们需要尽快解决掉这个问题。

title_en: My glasses are fogging up.
title_zh: 我的眼镜起雾了。

title_en: To be honest, that one's a long shot.
title_zh: 说实话，希望渺茫。

title_en: Would you consider going into business with me?
title_zh: 你会考虑和我一起做生意吗？

title_en: I‘m willing to help you out,but you've got to put forth a little more effort.
title_zh: 我愿意帮你，但是你自己也得努力一点儿。

title_en: You can't beat face-to-face communication, you know?
title_zh: 面对面交流才是最好的方式，你知道吗？

title_en: Ultimately, it's up to all of us individuals to reduce our carbon footprint.
title_zh: 总而言之，减少碳足迹是我们每一个人的责任。

title_en: It's crooked. It's tilting to the right.
title_zh: 歪了，向右边歪了。

title_en: I want to try to shed a few pounds and get back in shape.
title_zh: 我要努力减肥，恢复健美的体型。

title_en: Are you sure that it's sturdy enough to support your weight?
title_zh: 你确定椅子足够坚固，可以撑住你吗？

title_en: I'm thinking we should take the first step in our new cupcake buiness...
title_zh: 我在想，我们可以迈出我们蛋糕事业的第一步了...

title_en: Would you mind covering for me while I'm out?
title_zh: 我请假时你能给我代班吗？

title_en: No, thanks. Sunscreen makes my skin feel all oily.
title_zh: 谢谢，不用了，涂了防嗮我的皮肤会油。

title_en: I can't put up with their incessant bickering.
title_zh: 我受不了他们没完没了的争吵。

title_en: We get most major national holidays,two weeks of paid vacation,and I think four stick days.
title_zh: 大部分重要的法定节假日我们都放假，还有两周的带薪年假，好像还有四天的病假。

title_en: Let's crack open the window and get some fresh air in here.
title_zh: 把窗户打开，让新鲜空气进来。

title_en: I can tolerate the heat ,but I can't stand this humidity!
title_zh: 我可以忍受热，但实在受不了这种湿热!

title_en: I need to swing by the office sand drop off a few documents.
title_zh: 我得顺道去趟办公司送几份文件。

title_en: My parents set really high standards for me and I haven't always lived up to them.
title_zh: 爸妈给我指定的标准很高，我并不是一直都能达到。

title_en: There are people who actually earn a good living as bloggers.
title_zh: 有些博主真的很赚钱。

title_en: That seems like a tough field to break into.
title_zh: 这似乎是个很难进入的领域。

title_en: You've taken on way too much, You need to scale back.
title_zh: 你负担太多，需要减负。

title_en: Let's not get bogged down in the details at this point.
title_zh: 此时此刻，我们别纠结于细枝末节。

title_en: We can't take in every stray that comes along.
title_zh: 我们不能收养遇到的每一只流浪猫。

title_en: You know me: I'm not one to chitchat on the phone for too long.
title_zh: 你知道我什么样，我不是那种煲电话粥的人。

title_en: You can't show up to an interview with scuffed shoes and you shirt untuckked!
title_zh: 你不能穿着磨坏的鞋子去面试，而且你的衬衫没有塞好！

title_en: Most importantly,you've got to be passionate abort it.
title_zh: 最重要的是你得对他满怀热情。

title_en: That look she gave him sent chills up my spine.
title_zh: 她看他的那一眼让我脊背发凉。

title_en: I got mixed up and called my landlord by mistake.
title_zh: 我犯糊涂了，把电话打到我房东那儿去了。

title_en: Don't let their pettiness and negativity get to you.
title_zh: 别为他们的小气和善意心烦。

title_en: You think you can just go around spending money left and right?
title_zh: 你觉得你能一直这样大手大脚花钱吗？

title_en: We've been cooped up in here for too long. Let's go get some fresh air.
title_zh: 我们在这里呆太久了，出去呼吸点新鲜空气吧。

title_en: We disaggre over whether or not to send her to private school.
title_zh: 我们对是否送她去私立学校意见不一。

title_en: Stop obsessing over it and just post it already!
title_zh: 别过于在意了，快发出去得了!

title_en: I bet the meeting this afternoon will be preety short since her's out.
title_zh: 我敢肯定今天下午的会很快就能结束，因为他不在。

title_en: You've just got force yourself to sit down and concentrate.
title_zh: 你必须强迫自己坐下来好好集中注意力。

title_en: If anything,I have to actively work to put on weight.
title_zh: 就算要做，我也是需要积极的增重。

title_en: That comes with a 90-day warranty. Would you like to purchease two-years warranty?
title_zh: 那产品享有90天保修期，您需要额外购买两年的延长保修期吗？

title_en: I must say,I've been quite impressed with the quality of the pictures that I've taken with it.
title_zh: 不得不说，我对他拍出照片的质量印象深刻。

title_en: She's a tremendous asset to the team, and we've lucky to have here.
title_zh: 她是我们团队的得力干将，我们很幸运与她共事。

title_en: This doesn't do it justice at all. You can't possibly capture the ensense of that experience on film.
title_zh: 这张没有照好，你根本照不出当时感受到的美。

title_en: Yeah,but then it'll be blocking one of the outlets.
title_zh: 没错，这个口味得慢慢习惯。

title_en: My phone bill was even higher than usual this month.
title_zh: 我这个月的电话费比平时还高。

title_en: I mostly wear neutral and earth tones.
title_zh: 我平时穿浅色和大地色系的衣服。

title_en: It's a nasty habit- bad for your health,expensive,not to mention the odor.
title_zh: 抽烟这个坏习惯，有害健康，费钱，更别提味道难闻了。

title_en: I made the equivalent of about thirty bucks an hour.
title_zh: 我相当于每小时赚三十块钱。

title_en: I wound up going over to Tim's place and sleeping on the couch.
title_zh: 最后我在蒂姆家的沙发上睡了一宿。

title_en: Word crashed while I was working on it, but luckily I was able to retrieve the file.
title_zh: Word 在使用中崩溃了，但幸好我把文档找回来了。

title_en: You've got to grow a ticker skin if you want to make it in this business.
title_zh: 想在这一行取得成功，你脸皮得更厚一点。

title_en: well,it's the thought that counts.
title_zh: 好吧，有心意就够了。

title_en: All that hard work and determination really paid off.
title_zh: 所有的努力和坚持都得到了回报。
